name: CreateCustomTable
description:
Create and configure a custom table via API.

Use this tool to create and configure custom tables for data management. Call this when you need to set up a new custom table in your system.

parameters.name: custom_table_label
parameters.description: The label for the custom table as it will appear in Ramp. This should be a descriptive name for easier identification.

value_schema.description: The custom table's label as displayed in Ramp

parameters.name: custom_table_api_name
parameters.description: Specify the API name for the custom table, used to identify it within the system.

parameters.name: table_type
parameters.description: The type of the table to be created. Use 'custom_table' for custom tables.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

parameters.name: table_label
parameters.description: The custom table's label as displayed in Ramp

value_schema.description: The custom table's label as displayed in Ramp

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
